Package org.opensextant.extractors.geo.rules

package org.opensextant.extractors.geo.rules

GeocodeRules

See the Geocoder Handbook,
https://github.com/OpenSextant/Xponents/blob/master/doc/Geocoder_Handbook.md.

  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ContextualOrganizationRule
     
    CoordinateAssociationRule
     
    CountryRule
     
    FeatureClassMeta
    data structure to capture our assumptions about feature types.
    FeatureRule
    FeatureRule is a rule that makes use of feature distribution across the gazetteer as well as known properties of specific feature types that make them more or less likely to be the best location type for a particular mention.
    GeocodeRule
     
    HeatMapRule
     
    LocationChooserRule
    A final geocoding pass or two.
    MajorPlaceRule
    Major Place rule -- fire this rule after Country rule.
    NameCodeRule
    A rule that associates a CODE with a NAME, when the pattern "NAME, CODE" appears within N characters of each other.
    NameRule
     
    NonsenseFilter
    Filter out nonsense tokens that match some city or state name.
    PersonNameFilter
     
    ProvinceAssociationRule
    Give a list of province metadata that scopes the document, mark the list of evaluated PlaceCandidates' locations as relevant or not.
    ProvinceNameSetter
